original_text: Then Jesus gave them another example. ‘Perhaps a king wants to fight a war against another king. But before he goes to fight, he sits down. He thinks to himself. “Can I win this war? My army is large, with 10,000 men. But the other king has twice as many soldiers in his army.
korean_text: 또 어떤 임금이 다른 임금과 싸우러 갈 때에 먼저 앉아 일만 명으로써 저 이만 명을 거느리고 오는 자를 대적할 수 있을까 헤아리지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus gave them another example
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님은 그들에게 다른 비유를 들어주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: 'Perhaps a king wants to fight a war
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 왕이 전쟁을 하고 싶을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: But before he goes to fight

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 전쟁에서 이길 수 있을까?

sentences.original_text: But the other king has twice as many soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 왕은 두 배나 더 많은 군사를 가지고 있습니다
